title: What are the pros and cons of hiding depression? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hiding your depression? Pros:> You skip the social stigma attached to mental illness.> You don't have to endure misguided or inappropriate reactions to your depression. Cons:>You don't get the help and support you need.>Feeling you have to hide your depression will deplete your self-esteem, adding to the problem.>If your behaviour becomes erratic, people will be less likely to forgive it.>You will lose the chance to find out which of your friends are worth anything.> Friends and family will see a change in you, and worry that it is permanent, unless you tell them otherwise.

If you're at all suicidal and you hide depression, you're much more likely to commit suicide because nobody will know that you need interventative attention; you'll be depressed, all alone, feeling hopeless and helpless, instead of treated and relatively happy as often as not.
